mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, R.ROOM1_ID, R.ROOM1_NAME, R.ROOM1_TYPE, M.MEM_USERID, TO_CHAR(R.ROOM1_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ROOM1_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.ROOM1_CONFIRMD,'YYYY-MM-DD')ROOM1_CONFIRMD, R.ROOM1_CONFIRM, L.LIKE_ID, L.LIKE_MEMID, L.LIKE_ROOM1ID FROM ROOM1 R , MEMBER M, ROOMLIKE L WHERE R.ROOM1_ID = M.MEM_ID AND M.MEM_ID = L.LIKE_MEMID AND L.LIKE_MEMID = #{MEM_ID}
